columns.Artist_ID: The unique identifier for each artist.
columns.Famous_Title: The title of the artist's well-known work.
columns.Famous_Release_date: The release date of the famous title.

artist.table_description: The table provides details about various music artists.

columns.ID: The unique identifier for each music festival.
columns.Music_Festival: The name of the music festival.
columns.Date_of_ceremony: The date when the festival ceremony took place.
columns.Category: The category for which the music festival is awarded.
columns.Volume: The foreign key linking to the volume table.
columns.Result: The outcome of the music festival nomination.

music_festival.table_description: The table provides details about various music festivals and their results.

columns.Volume_ID: The unique identifier for each volume.
columns.Volume_Issue: The specific issue number of the volume.
columns.Issue_Date: The publication date of the volume's issue.
columns.Weeks_on_Top: The number of weeks the song spent at the top position.
columns.Song: The title of the song featured in the volume.
columns.Artist_ID: The foreign key linking to the artist table.

volume.table_description: The table provides information about various music volumes and their songs.
